title: Just how bad is the Supreme Court's EPA decision?
description: Kate and Leah break down the "free-wheeling, free association analysis" of the Supreme Court's opinion in West Virginia v. Environmental Protection Agency. Basically, it's bad! And not just because of the impending climate apocalypse!
author: hey@crooked.com (kate shaw, leah litman)
content:encoded: Kate and Leah break down the "free-wheeling, free association analysis" of the Supreme Court's opinion in West Virginia v. Environmental Protection Agency. Basically, it's bad! And not just because of the impending climate apocalypse!
itunes:title: Just how bad is the Supreme Court's EPA decision?

itunes:keywords: climate change, greenhouse gas, supreme court, environmental law, epa, judiciary, clean air act
